About Us

Who We Are

Founded in 2022, Tejas Manufacture has quickly established itself as a dependable manufacturer of industrial equipment designed to improve efficiency, safety, and environmental compliance. Our modern facility, located on Barka Road, Baraut (Baghpat), is equipped with advanced machinery and a skilled workforce dedicated to engineering quality.

We work with a wide range of industries and provide end-to-end manufacturing, from concept to commissioning.

Our Core Values

Integrity

We operate with honesty and transparency in everything we do.

Innovation

We invest in R&D to develop smarter, more efficient equipment.

Quality

We follow stringent quality checks to ensure long-lasting performance.

Customer Focus

Your needs are at the center of our business.

Our Mission

To become a leading Indian manufacturer of industrial machinery by delivering high-quality, cost-effective, and energy-efficient equipment that exceeds customer expectations.

Our Vision

To promote sustainable industrial development by offering products that reduce pollution, save energy, and boost productivity.

Our Trusted partner

Proudly partnered with industry leaders.
